Bolas.display_help: You hurl a pair of bolas at your target entangling them and rendering them immobilized. For the duration of the effect the target may become knocked down. Recharge: Moderate
Bolas.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Poisoned_Dagger.display_help: You throw an envenomed blade at your target causing a moderate amount of lethal damage and causing them to suffer a fair amount of toxic damage over time. Foes struck by the Poisoned Dagger will also have their damage decreased. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Poisoned_Dagger.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Light DoT(Toxic), -DMG
Poisoned_Dagger.display_target_help: The poison from the Envenomed Dagger has reduced your damage and is causing you to suffer Toxic damage over time.

Freerunning.display_help: You are skilled at using your environment to your advantage to quickly traverse any obstacles that you come across. Freerunning grants you a considerable boost to both your jump height and run speed. While this power is active, you will also have access to the Athletics power which when clicked will boost this power's effects for a short time. Recharge: Moderate

Athletics.display_help: Activating this power will give you a massive burst of speed and jump power for a short time. Recharge: Very Long
Athletics.display_attacker_hit: You activate Athletics and can now run faster and jump higher!

Flying_Kick.display_help: You unleash a barrage of throwing knives at foes in front of you dealing Moderate lethal damage and an additional amount of toxic damage over time. Affected foes will also have their damage reduced slightly. Damage: Moderate, Light DoT(Toxic), Recharge: Long
Flying_Kick.display_short_help: Ranged(Cone), Moderate DMG(Lethal), Foe Light DoT(Toxic), -DMG

Life_Support_System.display_help: Life Support System immediately heals you and causes you to recover a moderate amount of health over time. This power's potency increases as your health decreases. Recharge: Very Long
Life_Support_System.display_target_help: You are recovering health over time due to your Life Support System.
Life_Support_System.display_attacker_hit: You activate your {PowerName} and heal your wounds.
